availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Edmund T. Long (Henry County, Kentucky, physician and ass't surgeon 6th Ky Inf USA)

body.p: Henry County, Kentucky physician and soldier. Kentucky native. Physician in Henry County, Kentucky, in 1860. Served in the 6th Kentucky Volunteer Infantry Regiment (U.S.A.) as assistant surgeon from March 23, 1862, to August 31, 1864.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henry County, Subdivision 1, p. 305.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henry County, Pleasureville, p. 360A.
Report of the Adjutant General of the State of Kentucky, vol. 1, 1861-1866 (Frankfort: Kentucky Yeoman Office, 1866), 718.
Compiled Service Records of Volunteer Union Soldiers who Served in Organizations From State of Kentucky, NARA RG 94, Microfilm Series M397, Roll 205.
U.S. Civil War Pension Index: General Index to Pension Files, 1861-1934, NARA RG 15, Microfilm Series T288, Application #891119, Certificate #678180.
Find A Grave, "Dr. E.T. Long (1822-1898)," Memorial #86684316, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/86684316 (accessed July 8, 2020).
